column1: The term pygmy is primarily associated with the African Pygmies, the hunter-gatherers of the [1] [1] (comprising the Bambenga, Bambuti and Batwa).
The [1] people of Myanmar are an exceptional case of a "pygmy" population of East Asian phenotype.
column5: or Trone. They are an ethnic group in the Himalayan foothills of northern Kachin, Myanmar, whose population is declining to the point where they may disappear entirely.
